Company Description

VRpatients is a leading provider of immersive clinical simulation platforms. Our software platform immerses healthcare providers and first responders into actual simulated case scenarios, allowing them to interview, assess, diagnose, and treat patients asynchronously. Available through a web-based platform or a clinical simulation experience with VR goggles, the VRpatients platform is on the cutting edge of immersive learning.

Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Regional Sales Manager. The Regional Sales Manager will be responsible for overseeing sales operations in a specific region, developing and executing sales strategies, prospecting and acquiring new clients, managing key accounts, conducting market research, negotiating contracts, and maintaining customer satisfaction. The Regional Sales Manager will also collaborate with the marketing team to create and implement promotional campaigns and attend industry events.

Qualifications
• Proven experience in medical and/or academia sales-preferably within the medical simulation industry
• Posses understaning of Immersive Learning and the various modes of content delivery-direct experience a plus.
• Possess understanding of SaaS sales;
• experience preferred
• Possess strong client relationships with in the medical simulation market prefered.
• Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
• Strong negotiation and closing skills
• Ability to build and maintain client relationships
• Experienced medical clinician is a plus
• Proven success in working independently and remote
